trans-unit.source: Provides methods for writing <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] documents or to a print queue in batch mode.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法來撰寫<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>物件加入至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]文件，或在批次模式中，列印佇列。

trans-unit.source: Because this class has no constructor, use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method to create an instance.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個類別沒有建構函式，所以使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>方法來建立執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The VisualsToXpsDocument writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the VisualsToXpsDocument.
trans-unit.target: VisualsToXpsDocument 寫入相同的目標<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>為<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>會建立 VisualsToXpsDocument。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> becomes a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>會變成文件中的頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that write operations can begin.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以開始寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: You must call this method before you call any <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫這個方法之前呼叫任何<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the last write operation, call <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.EndBatchWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個寫入作業之後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.EndBatchWrite%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.EndBatchWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels a synchronous writing operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消同步寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: For example, an exception is thrown if the Cancel method is called and a writing operation is not in progress.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果呼叫取消方法，且寫入作業不在進行中，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> is not compatible with a Cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: 狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>與取消作業不相容。

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous writing operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消非同步寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: For example, an exception is thrown if the CancelAsync method is called and a writing operation is not in progress.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 CancelAsync 方法呼叫，且寫入作業不在進行中，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> is not compatible with a CancelAsync operation.
trans-unit.target: 狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> CancelAsync 作業與不相容。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that write operations must end.
trans-unit.target: 表示必須結束寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: After the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A>, call this method.
trans-unit.target: 在上次呼叫之後<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A>，呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.BeginBatchWrite%2A> before any write operations.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.BeginBatchWrite%2A>任何寫入作業之前。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.BeginBatchWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> synchronously to an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>以同步方式將<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>寫入。

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> synchronously to an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref> and includes a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>以同步方式將<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>並包含<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`printTicket`特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，請使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>專屬於<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和適用於指定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>寫入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>表示文件的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> asynchronously to an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>以非同步方式寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>寫入。

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> asynchronously to an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref> and includes additional information that the caller wants to pass to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>以非同步方式寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>並包含呼叫端要傳遞至事件處理常式的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>寫入。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data that the caller wants to pass to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含呼叫端要傳遞至資料<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted"></xref>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> asynchronously to an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref> and includes a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>以非同步方式寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>並包含<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`printTicket`特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，請使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>專屬於<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和適用於指定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>寫入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>表示文件的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> asynchronously to an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>; also includes a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> and any additional information that the caller wants to pass to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>以非同步方式寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>; 也包含<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>和其他任何呼叫端要傳遞至事件處理常式的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`printTicket`特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，請使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>專屬於<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和適用於指定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>寫入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>表示文件的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the data that the caller wants to pass to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含呼叫端要傳遞至資料<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted"></xref>事件處理常式。
